GLOBAL PROTECT (VPN) Guide for St udent
Installation Guide for Windows  10 and Android Devices
Installation Guide for Windows 10.  ................................ ................................ ................................ .............  2
Installation Guide for Android Devices  ................................ ................................ ................................ .......  7
P a g e  2 | 8
Installation Guide for Windows 10.
Currently supported Version:
• Windows 10 32bit and 64bit version
You can check if your Windows OS is 32 bit or 64 bit by right click on “ My Computer ” -
->Click on Properties . It will show under “ System ” in right pane.
1. Open your Chrome browser and key -in https://sitvpn.s ingaporetech.edu.sg .
2. Key-in your Username: Student  ID and Password: Student  ID Password .
P a g e  3 | 8
3. Select “ Download Windows 64 bit GlobalProtect agent”.
4. The file will auto download, and you can find at the bottom of your browser .
P a g e  4 | 8
5. Click Next .
6. Click Next .
P a g e  5 | 8
7. Click Next .
8. Click Close  to finish the installation.
P a g e  6 | 8
9. Click the Windows button  and select GlobalProtect to launch the
10. VPN. Key -in “sitvpn.singaporetech.edu.sg”  and click “ Connect".
11. Sign In with your “ STUDENT  ID” and “ Password”.
12. Click “ Connect”.
P a g e  7 | 8
Installation Guide for Android Devices
Current Support Version: Android 4.0.3 and Later .
1. Open your Play Store Apps. Search “ GlobalProtect”.
2. Click Install.
3. Key-in sitvpn.singaporetech.edu.sg. Click Connect.
P a g e  8 | 8
4. Sign in using the STUDENT  ID and PASSWORD.
5. Click Always Allow.
6. The GlobalProtect will show Connected.
